website_summaries.verdict: Rocket League offers fantastic, over-the-top fun that anyone can enjoy, while also retaining the nuance required to be a highly competitive game and esport.
pros: Easy drop-in multiplayer mode makes online matchmaking a breeze
Expanded game modes give players new addicting matches to try
cons: Camera manipulation complicates the gameplay and can be frustrating for newcomers

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this on PS4 Platform. It does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on PS4 Platform. It does not work with PS4. I had to buy it again from the PS network. I need to return this item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mahir Al-Rawi

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately Amazon were very good and refunded immediately
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this code after searching on the internet and Amazon for Rocket League Xbox One. This was the top link provided. Was surprised when I tried to enter the code that it didn't work. Only after looking more closely did I realise that this is NOT for Xbox, but PC only. contacted Amazon and refund supplied. Amazon agreed that this is quite confusing, as it clearly states 'Online game code' but not which format. DO NOT buy this for Xbox One, and make the same mistake as I did. Fortunately Amazon were very good and refunded immediately. Product description should be far more clear and less confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this as you cannot download it to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this as you cannot download it to play on ps4, been in contact with steam, and they say you cannot use it, so would be grateful of a refund, as a complete waste of money and had to buy it again for our son.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favourites!
customer_reviews.text: GG, one of the best game ideas I have come across also one of the best executions at it as well. I have played about 50 hours of it with some friends and we have loved it! Although it is a shame Supersonic Rocket-Powered Battle Cars (except for the name) never got much attention, by the way SRPBC was the prequel to Rocket League. 9/10 because they haven't brought back the original pitches from SRPBC.

product_meta.title: Rocket League [PC Code]
product_meta.description:
Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based sequel to the beloved arena classic, Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars! A futuristic Sports-Action game, Rocket League, equips players with booster-rigged vehicles that can be crashed into balls for incredible goals or epic saves across multiple, highly-detailed arenas. Using an advanced physics system to simulate realistic interactions, Rocket League relies on mass and momentum to give players a complete sense of intuitive control in this unbelievable, high-octane re-imagining of association football.
System Requirements:Supported OS:Windows 10,Windows 7,Windows Vista,Windows 8Processor:2.0 GHz Dual CoreRAM:2 GB RAMHard Disk:2 GB Available SpaceVideo Card:Nvidia 8800 or ATI 2900Additional Requirements:Broadband Internet Connection Needed
Gamepad or Controller Recommended
Recommended System Requirements:Recommended Processor:2.0+ GHz Quad CoreRecommended RAM:4 GB RAMRecommended Hard Disk:2 GB Available SpaceRecommended Video Card:Nvidia 260 series or ATI 5850 or better
feature_bullets: All-new Season Mode that allows players to enjoy a full single-player experience
Extensive Battle-Car customizations with more than 10 billion possible combinations
Addictive 8-player online action with a variety of different team sizes and configurations
Amazing 2-, 3-, and 4-player splitscreen mode that can be played locally or taken online against other splitscreen players
Competitive cross-platform gameplay with PlayStation4 users
